OOC: Lynxiz is on the top of a mountain in the Rockies, btw.

::Lynxiz::
Lynxiz, having noticed the approaching bot, but not initially turning 
around, now does so. "I am Lynxiz, who are you, and what is your 
faction?" Lynxiz eyes the bot warily.


On 26 Feb 2001, at 23:51, airly2000@... wrote:

> Termitron:
> 
> Termitron walked crying and shouting his sorrow when something 
> captured his attention (The pod), he walked and looked curious to 
> Linxiz.
> 
> By a second, Termitron forgot his sorrow and asked her "Who're you?"
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> > Creaking and sound of rocks and pine needles fill the surrounding 
> > area as a mettalic semi-circular covering of a long lost pod opens 
> > slowly and cautiously from the debris to the crisp cold air of the 
> > Rockies. A curious black head with brown eyes appears through 
> > the opening first awakening to a world of white. "Whoa... where am 
> > I?" The bot pushes the cover the rest of the way off of the pod and 
> > gets out. "I'd better find my allies quickly," says the bot to 
> herself, 
> > "I know, I'll send out an encrypted signal." The bot transforms 
> into 
> > a lynx and sprints to the top of the mountain she is on. Soon, a 
> > encrypted signal on the Maximal frequency starts coming from the 
> > top of a mountain in the Rockies: 
> > # Maximals, I am Lynxiz and I am in need of assistance. I am not 
> > sure where I am othat than a mountain. You should be able to 
> > locate me with your computers with the location. # 
> > "Now I will wait." She finishes.
> 
>
